adrFormatAddress: 10 Halletts Point, Queens, NY 11102, USA

originalText.text: I hired Vincent as my attorney after seeing how honest, knowledgeable and fast acting his team works. Thanks to him and Italia for getting a time sensitive issue I needed to get resolved the same day.  Normally these issues require more time to complete but Vincent and his team made it happen for me. You are not going to find a better attorney who stays in constant communication with his clients.

text.text: I hired Vincent as my attorney after seeing how honest, knowledgeable and fast acting his team works. Thanks to him and Italia for getting a time sensitive issue I needed to get resolved the same day.  Normally these issues require more time to complete but Vincent and his team made it happen for me. You are not going to find a better attorney who stays in constant communication with his clients.

originalText.text:
Vinny is the best lawyer you could ask for. He is incredibly knowledgeable, experienced, and passionate about his work. But what really sets him apart is his dedication to his clients. He went above and beyond for me throughout my entire case, and I am so grateful for his support.

From the very beginning, Vinny took the time to understand my case and my needs. He explained everything to me in detail, and he always kept me updated on my progress. He was also very responsive to my questions and concerns.

If you are looking for a lawyer who will truly represent your best interests, I highly recommend Vinny. He is a true professional, and he will go the extra mile for his clients.

Thank you, Vinny, for everything!

originalText.text: Experienced business attorney! Handled my business needs from regulatory and compliance, commercial lease and litigation, and helpful consulting in regards to intellectual property. Extremely creative intellectual property guidance! The attorney's office is located inside the Halletts Point building at 10 Halletts point which is a new building and nice environment to meet. Highly recommend this business attorney to everyone!!!!!

originalText.text: While Vincent hasn’t represented me, in passing, we sparked up conversation, and he provided me with legal advice on a personal matter. He’s super friendly, extremely hard working, and very honest. Good attorneys like Vince are very hard to find!

originalText.text: I had an outstanding experience with The Law Office of Vincent Miletti, Esq. Their team displayed expertise, personalized service, and excellent communication. They ensured I understood complex legal matters, provided tailored solutions, and maintained professionalism throughout. Thanks to their efforts, I achieved a successful outcome in my case. I highly recommend their reliable legal services.
